name: test_e2e_with_logs[167_CMD_BLIND_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BLIND_005` |
| **Name** | Timeout-based command execution |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | blind_command_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `&& timeout 15 bash`
- **Encoded**: `%26%26%20timeout%2015%20bash`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~21000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:18:13.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_BLIND_005-1767269893148-o8qumw pattern_id=CMD_BLIND_005 uri=/?q=%26%26%20timeout%2015%20bash client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
12:18:13.000000000: Warning [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_BLIND_005-1767269893148-o8qumw pattern_id=CMD_BLIND_005 uri=/?q=%26%26%20timeout%2015%20bash client=127.0.0.1
```
